hero_section.title: Learn about the <marker>Miniswimmer method</marker>
hero_section.subtitle: Our method uses neurolinguistic programming and coaching to ensure children experience real and meaningful learning throughout their lives.

brandshowcase.description: Built by the same team behind numerous successful SaaS and digital products

features_with_image_section.title: What is our program about?
features_with_image_section.subtitle: Our swimming program is designed to help swimmers of all levels improve their technique, build endurance, and gain confidence in the water. Learn more about our program and how it can benefit you.

items.title: Aquatic Safety and Survival
items.subtitle: We empower individuals with drowning prevention techniques and water survival skills.

items.title: Building Water Confidence
items.subtitle: We foster independent and secure swimmers starting at a young age.

features_section.title: Developing Independent Swimmers
features_section.subtitle: Everything you need to build, launch, and scale your SaaS startup.

features.title: Ready-to-Use Integrations
features.description: Database (Postgres with Prisma ORM), Auth (NextAuth), Payments (Stripe), Sanity (Blog), MailChimp (Newsletter), OpenAI, Email, and Many More

features.title: Cutting-edge Technologies
features.description: Built-with cutting-edge technologies to provide a robust foundation for your SaaS product, giving you a competitive edge in the digital market.

features.title: High-quality Design
features.description: Every single component and page is designed with attention to detail on Figma and styled with Tailwind CSS for the Next.js front-end.

features.title: Admin and User Dashboard
features.description: Allows you to easily manage your SaaS operations and enables end-users to easily manage and modify their account settings with ease.

features.title: Fully Customizable
features.description: SaaSBold provides the flexibility to customize your software's design and functionality to meet your specific business requirements and branding. Everything is highly customizable and modular.

features.title: Rich Docs and Email Support
features.description: Docs includes detailed, step-by-step guide for every part of SaaSBold. If you need further assistance, simply open a support ticket and we will respond promptly.

items.question: Does this app offer a free trial period?
items.answer: All individual Framer subscriptions have been grandfathered into a Pro plan at your existing rate. If you were on a Small Team plan, then all 5 seats have been converted over to Pro seats at your existing rate.

items.answer: All individual Framer subscriptions have been grandfathered into a Pro plan at your existing rate. If you were on a Small Team plan, then all 5 seats have been converted over to Pro seats at your existing rate.

items.question: What's the refund policy?
items.answer: All individual Framer subscriptions have been grandfathered into a Pro plan at your existing rate. If you were on a Small Team plan, then all 5 seats have been converted over to Pro seats at your existing rate.

testimonials_section.title: What Our Families Say: Success Stories in the Water
testimonials_section.subtitle: Discover why so many families trust us to introduce their little ones to the wonderful aquatic world. These testimonials reflect our commitment to the safety, learning, and fun of each of our swimmers.

items.name: Andrea Zalavari
items.comment: Wonderful experience and method! My little one makes progress in every class and also has a great time! Thank you Miniswimmer ❤️

items.name: Avo Queen
items.comment: It was very difficult to find classes for my 2-year-old daughter, as they were all very monotonous and she would get bored. Until I found this school on social media and went to try a class. I was fascinated by the millions of materials and games they use. I had never seen anything like it. My daughter is the happiest now. We enrolled her and she's been attending for 2 months and has already started swimming by herself, and now I can't get her out of the water. We are very happy as a family.

items.name: Paloma Ferrero
items.comment: Excellent classes! The pool is wonderfully set up for children to enjoy, with innovative and colorful materials, and the coaches are by far the best! They all have extensive experience with babies and children. My daughter has an amazing time every visit and has learned so much :)

items.name: Javier Arancibia
items.comment: Very good classes, and very educational for the children

items.name: Chay
items.comment: I discovered this swim academy on social media; my son is 8 years old. The location in La Reina is convenient, with private and secure parking. What really stands out is their teaching methodology. The teachers are dedicated and make each class a fun and educational experience. My son has progressed remarkably since he started. At first, he was afraid of water, but now he swims with confidence. The instructors have incredible patience and explain techniques in ways that children easily understand...

cta_section.title: Transform your child's future with Miniswimmer
cta_section.subtitle: Our unique method combines neurolinguistic programming and coaching to ensure meaningful and lasting learning.
